languages.text: "Как есть говорю — помиловал{mf||а} меня {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость. Не враг {mf|он|она} нам! А Немезит про {mf|него|нее} лжет, получается!"
"I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"
languages.original_text: "Как есть говорю — помиловал{mf||а} меня {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость. Не враг {mf|он|она} нам! А Немезит про {mf|него|нее} лжет, получается!"

traits.locale_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! And Nemesite is lying about {mf|him|her}!"
"I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! And Nemesite is lying about {mf|him|her}!"
"I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is untrue!"
"I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is untrue!"
"I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"
"I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"

languages.text: "Ich sage Euch, {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} hat mich begnadigt. {mf|Er ist nicht unser Feind|Sie ist nicht unsere Feindin}! Was Nemesit über {mf|ihn|sie} sagt, sind alles Lügen!"
languages.original_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sage Euch, {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} hat mich begnadigt. {mf|Er ist nicht unser Feind|Sie ist nicht unsere Feindin}! Was Nemesit über {mf|ihn|sie} sagt, sind alles Lügen!"

languages.text: «Te digo que mi{mf|lord|lady} me ha indultado. ¡No es {mf|nuestro enemigo|nuestra enemiga}! ¡Lo que Nemesitio cuenta de {mf|él|ella} es mentira!».
languages.original_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"

traits.locale_text: «Te digo que mi{mf|lord|lady} me ha indultado. ¡No es {mf|nuestro enemigo|nuestra enemiga}! ¡Lo que Nemesitio cuenta de {mf|él|ella} es mentira!».

languages.text: 「あのな、陛下は許してくださった。{mf|彼|彼女}は敵じゃない！ネメサイトがする{mf|彼|彼女}の話はすべて嘘だ！」
languages.original_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"

traits.locale_text: 「あのな、陛下は許してくださった。{mf|彼|彼女}は敵じゃない！ネメサイトがする{mf|彼|彼女}の話はすべて嘘だ！」

languages.text: “我说的是真的，大人已经赦免我的罪过了。{mf|他|她}根本就不是我们的敌人！涅墨斯特说的那些关于{mf|他|她}的话，都是在胡说八道！”
languages.original_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"

traits.locale_text: “我说的是真的，大人已经赦免我的罪过了。{mf|他|她}根本就不是我们的敌人！涅墨斯特说的那些关于{mf|他|她}的话，都是在胡说八道！”

languages.text: « Puisque je te dis que Sa Seigneurie m'a pardonné.C'est pas notre {mf|ennemi|ennemie} ! Némésite nous a raconté des salades ! »
languages.original_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"

traits.locale_text: « Puisque je te dis que Sa Seigneurie m'a pardonné.C'est pas notre {mf|ennemi|ennemie} ! Némésite nous a raconté des salades ! »

languages.text: "Ben size ne diyorum... {mf|Lord|Leydi}Hazretleri, beni affetti. O bize düşman değil! Nemezit'in onun hakkında dediklerinin hepsi yalan!"
languages.original_text: "I am telling you, {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} has pardoned me. {mf|He|She} is not our enemy! What Nemesite says about {mf|him|her} is all lies!"
